item.title: Yo Dawg, I heard you like Garlic Bread...
item.description: Not the exact recipe from above, but... To make Lasagna-stuffed Garlic Bread, hollow out a loaf of Italian bread, fill the cavity with layers of cooked lasagna noodles, meat sauce (ground beef, marinara), ricotta, and mozzarella cheese, brush the outside with garlic butter, then bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-30 minutes until bubbly and golden. Garnish with Parmesan and fresh basil for a cheesy, garlicky twist on classic lasagna. Ingredients: 1 large loaf of Italian or French bread Lasagna noodles (cooked) Meat sauce (marinara + cooked ground beef/sausage) Ricotta cheese Shredded mozzarella cheese Grated Parmesan cheese Garlic butter (melted butter, minced garlic, Italian seasoning) Fresh parsley or basil, chopped (for garnish) Instructions: 1. Prep Bread & Oven: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Slice the bread in half lengthwise and scoop out some of the soft bread to create a boat. 2. Make Garlic Butter: Mix melted butter, minced garlic, and Italian seasoning in a small bowl. 3. Layer Filling: Spread a little marinara or cheese on the bottom of the bread boat, then layer with cooked noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella. Repeat layers until full. 4. Assemble: Top the last layer with more mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. 5. Add Garlic Butter: Brush the garlic butter mixture generously over the top and sides of the bread. 6. Bake: Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly and the bread is toasted. For extra browning, you can broil for 1-2 minutes, watching carefully. 7. Garnish & Serve: Let it rest briefly, then garnish with fresh basil or parsley before slicing and serving.

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1585 (fun coping mechanisms)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
PSA: just make it with sugar and water: 1 part sugar, 4 parts water. Red dye is unnecessary: hummingbirds clue in and see the red on the feeder just fine.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "[unintelligible] Pippin." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin

item.title: Purpose
item.description: Every time a new reader, somewhere in the world, comes across our comic and laughs, their face pops up before our inner mind's eye. They become part of the War and Peas World. This world is fueled by actual imagination and is 100% human-made (except for the occasional alien intervention). It's been built through years of joy-filled and gut-wrenching work alike. There are no shortcuts. No schemes. But there is much laughter! We see you chuckle and dance, skipping along your merry day. And honestly? That's what keeps us going. If you'd like to help us keep creating, consider supporting us on Patreon. Your support means we can keep drawing comics instead of getting real jobs. https://www.patreon.com/warandpeas
item.dc:creator: Warandpeasofficial

“From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere.” - Dr. Seuss So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've honestly been my lifeline. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me
